metadata.description: Official Claude Code plugins for the Wasp framework

plugins.name: wasp
plugins.description:
Enhances Claude to give you an optimal experience developing full-stack web apps with Wasp (React, Node.js, Prisma), by providing curated access to docs, workflows and best practices.
